Instruction: 'Wash the spinach leaves and pat them dry with paper towels.'
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.'
'Sprinkle all-purpose flour over the melted butter and whisk continuously for 1-2 minutes to make a roux.'
Slowly pour in heavy cream, whisking constantly to prevent lumps.'
Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the mixture begins to thicken.'
'Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and nutmeg.'
Add spinach leaves to the skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, until wilted.'
